articles.description: Middlesbrough are in talks to with neighbours Newcastle United over a deadline day deal for midfielder Jeff Hendrick, TEAMtalk understands.
articles.content:
Middlesbrough are in talks with neighbours Newcastle United over a deadline day deal for midfielder Jeff Hendrick, TEAMtalk understands.

articles.title: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer gets back on the road with Manchester United to watch his daughter Karna play - Daily Mail
articles.description: Solskjaer was sacked by United in November after a string of poor results ended in a humiliating 4-1 loss to relegation-threatened Watford.
articles.content:
Former Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer got back on road with the club to watch his daughter Karna play for the Women's team.
